session.objective: Run comprehensive retrospective on PR #908 and create GitHub issues for each actionable item

workLog.action: Delegated comprehensive retrospective to retrospective agent
workLog.outcome: Created 1,514-line analysis with Five Whys, Fishbone, Force Field Analysis

workLog.action: Reviewed retrospective findings and extracted actionable items
Created 20 GitHub issues from retrospective items
workLog.outcome: Issues #934-953 created with proper labels, priorities, and cross-references

decisions.decision: Used retrospective agent for deep analysis instead of direct analysis
decisions.rationale: 228+ comments require comprehensive root cause analysis with multiple frameworks (Five Whys, Fishbone, Force Field)
decisions.outcome: Effective - produced 1,514-line comprehensive analysis with 5 root causes and 8 atomic learnings

decisions.decision: Created individual GitHub issues rather than epic with sub-tasks
decisions.rationale: User requested 'one item per issue' for backlog consideration, enabling independent prioritization
decisions.outcome: Provides granular backlog management with clear effort estimates (P0=7h, P1=15h, P2=26h)

decisions.decision: Fixed label format error immediately after first issue creation
decisions.rationale: Discovered priority-p0 doesn't exist (should be priority:P0), ran gh label list to verify
decisions.outcome: Prevented creating 19 more incorrectly labeled issues

learnings.insight: PR #908's failure stemmed from 5 root causes: governance without enforcement, invisible commit counter, ADR exceptions too easy, tool scope too broad, security scanning too late
learnings.actionable: Implement pre-PR validation script (Issue #934) and commit counter in orchestrator (Issue #936)

learnings.insight: GitHub label format uses colon separator (priority:P0) not dash (priority-p0) - verified via gh label list
learnings.actionable: Always verify label format before bulk issue creation

learnings.insight: Comprehensive retrospectives (1,500+ lines) are valuable but require specialized agent - produced 8 atomic learnings with 82-98% atomicity scores
learnings.actionable: Delegate deep retrospectives to retrospective agent, use reflect skill for quick learnings

learnings.insight: Breaking down retrospectives into individual issues (20 total) with effort estimates enables granular prioritization and sprint planning
learnings.actionable: Standard pattern: retrospective → actionable items → GitHub issues with effort estimates

issuesCreated: #947 ADR-XXX: ADR exception justification framework (ADR proposal)
#953 Update existing memories with PR #908 learnings (P2, 1h)
outcomes.completionStatus: Complete - comprehensive retrospective completed and all actionable items converted to GitHub issues

nextActions: Commit retrospective document and session log
Address P0 issues first (7h total effort)
